EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-01-12
EmailTemplate.subject: Pairing with Google and Scaling a Machine Learning Model
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
January 12, 2016 <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/web-series-pair-programming-with-pivotal-google]]> Pivotal and Google Engineers Pair Together Pivots and Googlers explain why PCF runs so well on Google Cloud in this new web series. Check it Out <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/web-series-pair-programming-with-pivotal-google]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/p-o-v/2017-the-dawn-of-the-golden-age-of-software]]> The Dawn of the Golden Age of Software Say goodbye to the auto industry and hello to mobility, virtual assistants, and more from the Internet of Things. Read More <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/p-o-v/2017-the-dawn-of-the-golden-age-of-software]]> <[[https://www.infoq.com/podcasts/neha-batra]]> Pivotal Labs Pair Programming In this podcast, Neha Batra talks with Wesley Reisz about pair programming and vulnerability-based trust. Listen to the Episode <[[https://www.infoq.com/podcasts/neha-batra]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/be-like-the-cloud-natives-use-datastax-for-high-performing-databases]]> How To: Scaling a Machine Learning Model Using Pivotal Cloud Foundry Chris Rawles gives a great example of a machine learning app scaling gracefully on PCF. Read More <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/p-o-v/how-to-scaling-a-machine-learning-model-using-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> <[[https://youtu.be/9LmWli3sElk]]> IoT in the Cloud: Build and Unleash the Value in Your Renewable Energy System Mark Heckler introduces us to IoT and Cloud concepts and demonstrates how one necessitates the other. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/9LmWli3sElk]]> <[[https://thewomenintechshow.com/2017/01/09/cloud-computing-with-cornelia-davis/]]> Cloud Computing with Cornelia Davis Cornelia Davis talks all things cloud in this episode of the Women in Tech Show. Listen to the Episode <[[https://thewomenintechshow.com/2017/01/09/cloud-computing-with-cornelia-davis/]]> <[[https://youtu.be/STx6L0r_juk]]> From Commit to Production in 10 Minutes Dave Ehringer shares Liberty Mutual's experiences instating CI/CD and best practices they picked up along the way. Watch the Talk <[[https://youtu.be/STx6L0r_juk]]> Upcoming Events 1/17 Using Data Science for Cybersecurity, Online <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]>
1/25 How to rapidly connect PCF apps to all your microservices, APIs, databases, and cloud apps, Online <[[http://go.azuqua.com/How-to-rapidly-connect-PCF-apps-to-all-your-microservices-APIs-databases-and-cloud-apps.html]]>
1/25 Microsoft Technology Center, Edina <[[https://www.microsoftevents.com/profile/form/index.cfm?PKformID=0x9754804ac8]]>
2/6 Dynatrance Perform, Las Vegas <[[https://www.dynatrace.com/perform/]]>
2/7 Using Advanced Analytics for Better Customer Experience, Online <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/9573/239771]]>
2/21 StartupGrind Global Conference, Redwood City <[[https://www.startupgrind.com/conference/]]>
